twoSetSkill.name: Floral Bounties 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When attacked by weakened enemies, there is a 40% chance that the Valkyrie takes zero DMG (does not protect against Elemental DMG). CD: 3s.

threeSetSkill.name: Fertile Earth 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Increases HP and SP bag recovery by 50%.
